website_summaries.verdict: Many people appreciated the New Balance Fresh Foam Roav Knit. It was able to receive good reviews from runners who have tried it. They were happy with this running gear’s affordable price and stylish design. People also like the lightweight structure and cushioning system of this shoe, while some testers who have shared their disappointment toward the shoe’s construction. Overall, many still recommended the New Balance Fresh Foam Roav Knit because of its flexibility and breathability.
pros: According to various consumers, the New Balance Fresh Foam Roav Knit is very comfortable to wear
This running shoe provides great support, several users mentioned
A lot of wearers were impressed with the New Balance Fresh Foam Roav Knit's lightweight structure
Some purchasers expressed that the shoe is not only perfect for running and workout sessions but also casual wear
Great shoe for people with a normal or wide foot, a tester commented
This affordable running gear is lightweight, stylish, and worth every dollar, as written by a commenter
The upper unit of Fresh Foam Roav Knit gained favor for being flexible and breathable
Many consumers commented that it has a good cushioning ability
cons: A buyer, who has a narrow foot, commented that the shoe is too wide for her because it is made with an inner cleat lining
The tongue folds up and presses into the top of the foot if you tighten the laces, said a few consumers

customer_reviews.title: Naked marshmallows
customer_reviews.text: My husband has two pair. “BABE, these shoes!!” We search for so long for really good sneakers for the work that we do and he found these. “Good?” “Better than good!” I thought he was over doing it til I got mine in the mail. When I tell you guys these sneakers make my feet feel like they are naked while walking on marshmallows... They are so light and roomy. My toes aren’t bunched up and I can walk in them for eight hrs or more and my feet do not feel tired at all. I’m getting two more pair. If you’re thinking about making a purchase, do it. You will NOT regret it.
customer_reviews.author: SheHer

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: Literally obsessed with these shoes! I have a stupid amount of tennis shoes and these might be my new favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I’m a nurse and being on my feet for 12 hours was totally doable in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these wore them once and loved them! Went to wear second time and the piece that holds the lace on the left shoe completely riped off, barely with tightening them. Ordered a replacement. They both are missing insoles...how? What? And why? Very disappointed in whoever is this third party seller. Get it together! One thing if they were inexpensive shoes but I paid over $80.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Reger

customer_reviews.title: Feet hurt still
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from chronic plantar fascitis. I've had 3 surgeries. So, every 5 or 6 months I need new shoes. I really want to like these shoes, but they hurt my feet. I have never had a problem with new balance running shoes. These shoes are super cute, and I love the design. I am in the healthcare field and am constantly walking. 3 days into these and I still cant bear them. I think they will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: JULEEEEE

customer_reviews.title: Love New Balance shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe absolutely a great find! I love New balance. These are my work shoes and I’m constantly moving so I found New Balance shoes to be super light weight and durable. The sole is not excessively thick and heavy which is great but thick enough to feel sole support! I did try them with a thinner sock and did not like them my feet kinda hurt more at the end of the day so that’s why I continued wearing a thicker sock.
customer_reviews.author: taaron rubin

customer_reviews.title: Width selection does not matter, you still get  wide
customer_reviews.text: These ship wide whether you like it or not. You can select the width of the shoe and still get shipped a wide shoe. I returned two pairs because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: LOOKS great and comfortable!!! Good for regular walking, not power walking. So happy I made the purchase! My firbaby, Tofu, agrees.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but not good for running!!
customer_reviews.text: The length of the shoe is right in point with the size chart, however, I didn't get a wide fitting and they are loose on the heal due to the width. The shoe is GREAT for HIIT workouts, walking, biking but absolutely not good for running. I'm a runner and they killed my feet after mile 1 but while performing high interval training, they support the ball of my feet great. Great looking shoe, just not good for running, unless you run on your toes.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely regret purchase!! Feet went numb when worn.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the size I normally wear. Tried on the shoes and they seemed a little snug but was ok. I took a walk outside and within 5 mins my feet started going numb. I had to return home and take them off. So a couple days later I thought maybe they need to be worn (stretched). So I go for another walk. My feet started hurting again and went numb. I had to call someone to pick me up. I didn't even walk back. Need to return these but they don't allow returns if been worn...smh. I wasted $85. Definitely don't recommend anyone buy from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Yteriah

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and sturdy. Im a nurse that’s works 12hr shifts and I have a neuroma in my foot. I’ve bought 3 different shoes in the last month and these were the only ones that worked for me. Comfy after being on my feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great support and light weight for neutral gate
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a 7.5 or 8 in NB depending on the style. I ordered an 8 in these. The purple color is vibrant and a great lilac. There is medium arch support and is great for a neutral gate. They are lower weight. Very easy to slip on and off even though the tongue is attached. The heel offers a little extra impact padding.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: great sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers! great color and fit for me. With that said for those of you with average width feet these are VERY ROOMY! I however, have what I describe as Fred Flinstone feet. Short and wide with a high instep and i have orthotics that have to go in my shoes. These sneakers are even roomy with those inside. These are super comfortable for walking. I walk 5 or more miles a day and these are awesome! I wear a 7.5 wide and that is what I ordered! Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: These are just the prettiest!
customer_reviews.text: I love the combination of the light lavender/orchid and black. The pastel color is so very delicate. I ordered a 6.5W which 6W and 6.5W is my usual size in shoes; in closed toe shoes 6.5W for sure. They are nice and comfy and wide enough for my feet (which are a bit wider than a B width). I have another pair of quilted New Balance which is a 7W and both pairs of shoes fit nicely. I could have taken a 7W in these and more than likely that would have worked, also. I love the fabric on the heels. My heel is narrow and this material is conforming. No slippage or rubbing. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: More of That

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I stopped buying tennis shoes a decade ago because I never thought they were comfortable or made my feet look good (I have large feet size 10). I started working for Amazon in sept and needed something I could walk and stand in all day without foot pain (many medical issues with the joints and bones) and these have been great! I walk about 18miles a day in the warehouse in a 10 hour shift and they’ve held up nicely without causing me extra pain. I got them in a wide and they accommodate all of my issues. The styling is complimentary to my foot size shame.
customer_reviews.author: mary h.

customer_reviews.title: MOST COMFORTABLE SHOE EVER
customer_reviews.text: I have RA, and it affects my feet, whereby shoes are my nemesis. I needed to find a walking shoe that I could walk in and not hobble home after only a short distance. I bought a wide, though I don't usually wear a wide, but coupled with that and the lightness of the this sneaker and the foam cushioning inside, it truly is the most comfortable shoe I own. I'm used to bare feet, Birks or slippers because of the pain. I wore this shoe all day and never once paid any notice to having it on. If you suffer from sore joints, toes, and pain in your feet, give this shoe a try. Thanks New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers!!! It is hard to find comfortable sneakers! I am always on my fit and no matter what brand I get, sneakers always hurt my feet but not these!!! These are my first new balance sneakers and will forever be my favorite!!! I am buying another pair in another color asap!! I wear a size 11 and they don't appear bulky, they are beautiful and soooo comfortable!!! I love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look and feel of the sneakers. Wearing for a month and now have holes in the mesh where my big toes are. With only wearing to walk/run in the mornings they did not hold up. No my nails do not need cut. That would be unbearable with running. See photo. I would not recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: tawnyamburgey

customer_reviews.title: No arch support
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't run in this shoe because it has no arch support. My feet hurt even after walking a short distance. Wish I hadn't bought them!
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Beyond comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these shoes. I bought them as a walking shoe to wear during our cruise. I actually wore them during our stop in San Juan. We walked over 25,000 steps in San Juan on a self walking tour and these were beyond comfortable. My feet felt great all day wearing them, I never had a problem with them pinching or rubbing my heels. New balance makes some of the best running shoes (in my opinion) and these Roav's did not disappoint. I will be buying additional pairs in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Seem to run a little big on me
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the look of these. They seemed to fit well, but when I walked around in them in the house the heel slipped. Also, while they appear to have good cushioning, they feel more firm than I expected and jogging up the hall and through the kitchen over wood flooring and ceramic tile I could feel the impact on my knees. Didn't think I'd get very far running on the street. That's not to say they wouldn’t work for someone else, just not for me. I wear a 9M in Nike and shoes that fit similar or 8.5M in Adidas. I purchased these in 8.5M which is my usual NB size.
customer_reviews.author: LalagirlTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, comfortable, stay true to size.
customer_reviews.text: I got the all white ones with pink and black. I love these shoes. I bought them for myself as a going back to the gym present after Covid lockdown and weight gain. I've worn them once so far they held up nice for my hour training session. Did some cardio and felt like i was walking on air. I really just like the way they look. They're kinda wide too. I'm a true 8 but always get worried cause sometimes it's too snug so i got an 8.5 they're a little big probably could've stayed to my size but I'm not going to return them cause it's not a big deal. All in all so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Smart Ass 101

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have MS and struggle to find a trainer that works for my feet. These solved the problem. They are incredibly comfortable with no breaking in needed. They support my feet and the sole makes wearing them a dream. I can use them to work out and just for wandering around the stores. I don’t run but I kick box and they are perfect for that. The webbing across the front does let in water so I won’t be wearing them when it’s raining but that’s okay, they will stay looking new if I keep them dry. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Not a good running shoe
customer_reviews.text: That is for a birthday and I have been running in them. My legs were killing me so I Contacted my Doctor Who referred me to a podiatrist he told me to quit wearing the shoes immediately they are not good and I could damage my legs really bad I have really bad shinsplints. I’ve been stretching every day and my doctor told me it was not a problem it is the tennis shoe I would love to have a refund....did not get full refund
customer_reviews.author: Marsha and Robert Reeder

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase  x2
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and comfy. Plenty of toe room. Not sure if I would run in these. Size 10. I walk 3-5 miles a few days a week. These are comfy and It’s a solid cute shoe to move around in during-#covidhussle I bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: amazon  customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT REALLY NEW BALANCE
customer_reviews.text: Shoes arrived and looked like legit New Balance shoes but upon investigation, these shoes were created in China, boxed and shipped from China. New Balance makes all of their shoes in the US so these are knockoffs that feel nothing like real New Balance shoes. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Kattawar

customer_reviews.title: Good support, comfortable, affordable.
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes for walking everyday. They are very comfortable and offer good support. I broke my ankle a couple of years ago and occasionally have pain, these seem to help. I also love the width of these shoes. My foot is slightly wider than average, and typically I wear standard shoe size. I ordered these in wide because I wanted extra space when walking for exercise everyday so I could insure comfort. These are perfect. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Howard

customer_reviews.title: NOT for running
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up on deal of the day sale. I've been a Brooks fan for years but thought I would switch it up due to all the great reviews. I ran 3 miles in these the morning after I got them and was in pain. I've never had a pair of Brooks that needed to be broke in. Thought maybe they weren't great for running and only for walking. Just went on a 4 mile walk and now in pain. The shoes are cute but garbage. There is an awkwardly large clump of foam on the bottom that prevents the sole of the shoe from flexing. They are also lacking any type of arch support. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes, bad for running
customer_reviews.text: I tried these shoes out and really enjoyed them during my cross fit workouts. I am used to minimalist shoes and these provided a lot of comfort while going through my workouts. On the 8th day of having these shoes, however, I sprained my ankle due to the high heel on these shoes which is great torque for rolling an ankle, as confirmed by my doc as well. Beware with shoes like these, great for walking, but not running!
customer_reviews.author: Becka Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Already ordered a second pair!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how comfortable these shoes are! I’ll admit I got them because I thought they were cute but as soon as I put them on I was really impressed. They’re extremely lightweight, too. I already ordered a second pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 12 hour shift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear for work as a nurse in an emergency department. This was my fourth brand of shoe (plus multiple inserts) purchased in an attempt to find something that would help my foot and knee pain. These are adorable and incredibly comfortable! Pros: -short laces that actually stay tied! -reduces foot and knee pain dramatically -fit perfectly, no cramped toe box, no slipping heal, no break in needed -super cute with all types of scrub pants Cons: -Material is hard to clean and not water or urine proof
customer_reviews.author: rj1129

customer_reviews.title: Great fit but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because of the reviews and the style and the best was they had my size. They are great walking shoes. The only downside is that the soles have started to squeak, while it really doesn’t bother me, I would assume that if I had to wear them in an office or for indoor work, it would get annoying really fast. Shoes are great, but the squeaking soles brought it down one.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Nowotny

customer_reviews.title: Not good for heel pain
customer_reviews.text: Bought them because of the claimed heel support for my plantar fasciitis but unfortunately they are not even close to soft cushiony they claim to be. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena J.

customer_reviews.title: Too much work to put on
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoes and comfortable once you get in them albeit a bit narrow. Giving three stars because the tall back is so floppy I can’t get them on without using a shoe horn so I can’t wear them anywhere I may want/need to remove my shoes (i.e. airport etc). I ordered a wide but think they sent me a regular as they fit so narrowly.
customer_reviews.author: Halycon

customer_reviews.title: So light and so cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers! I wanted a sneaker that wasn't Nike and wasn't WAY over priced and these are perfect! I also couldn't believe how light they were. I have pain in my left heel and most sneakers that I wear, I'll begin to feel the pain after a few hours around the house, but I've been wearing these most of the day for about 3-4 days and no issues. I don't run, so I can't speak on the subject of them being a great running sneaker, but these are a great option for a sporty sneaker to throw on with some leggings to either run errands or hang around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I use mine for walking. I need a firm bottom that doesn’t flex and cushioning dUe to surgery and screws in my foot. I wear wide tennis shoe only because of bunion on R foot the rest of my foot is not wide. Because these shoes have the one piece tongue with an elastic band it was a little extra fabric for me but they are really comfortable. If I order another color I’ll get a medium. My daughter wears them and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D.

customer_reviews.title: Jury Still Out
customer_reviews.text: I've had these shoes for a little over a week. They were designed differently than any other shoes I've had (tongue that is a permanent part of the shoe, shoe is made almost to slip on and off without tying or untying). The shoes are really comfortable and look good. I am a little hesitate to recommend them until I've had them a while. I wish the toes had a little reinforcement as I am afraid my toe is going to wear through the mesh. So I don't know about longevity. But as of now, I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: enjay

customer_reviews.title: Great color super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE!! They’re bright and super comfortable, like walking on a cloud. I have never bought a pair of New Balance these are my first pair the last pair of Brooks I bought a year ago still hurt my feet. I believe I will never buy another pair of Brooks. These are awesome, but it’s also the first day.
customer_reviews.author: samantha bratcher

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, the most comfortable athletic shoes I’ve ever worn. They fit perfectly. I have narrow heels and wide feet, a terrible combination, and these grip my heels without giving me blisters and the wide width gives me more than enough room without feeling insecure or floppy. I’ll buy these over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Coletta

customer_reviews.title: Toe box to narrow and uncomfortable to wear for long periods.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the style and the light weight of it but even though the discription said it had a good roomy toe bos I found it way to narrow. Also little or no support. I stand on my feet up to 8 hours a day and after just an hour my feet were killing me. They are great for walking for shorter periods of time but I wanted them for work. I tried to order the extra wide and the toe box was great but they fell off the back of my foot. I returnrd those. I am sorry to say they are not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price-poor construction
customer_reviews.text: This is about the fourth pair of new balance I have decided to send back. Unfortunately it is once again because they are not made correctly. They are too short and yet slip up and down on my heel. They are flimsy and have little support over toe box-fabric is thin and I bet they will rip out at toes.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but still supportive
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a walking shoe that I could slip into without necessarily having to wear socks. These are perfect. I also needed a pair that were black so I could wear them to work (in a hospital) that didn't scream loud vibrant colors. I wanted them to blend into my standard black pants uniform. The first time I wore them I did rub blisters but after wearing them with band-aids the 2nd and 3rd time they were fine. It was probably my own fault for going sockless.
customer_reviews.author: Terry T.

customer_reviews.title: Good for walking but not an all day wearing shoe
customer_reviews.text: This was the second pair of these shoes that I have bought. I work on my feet 12 to 14 hours a day and require a very sturdy shoe to keep my feet from hurting. My last pair was far better in the padding that lines the bottom of the shoe. They look nice but definitely needs thicker padding in the shoe. Fits as sized...Overall a decent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenya J Havlin

customer_reviews.title: Helped with foot and knee pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought these during quarantine when I started having terrible foot and knee pain after moving the horses to a larger facility that required much more walking to get through the daily chores. It was so bad I wanted to try to go to a specialist running shoe store but none were open due to Covid. A marathon-running friend suggested these and I'm so grateful that they totally resolved the problems I was having in my feet and knees.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Fit perfectly, very comfy, look great....they have almost eliminated my knee pain from running. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable durable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable sole and width. Seems to sit slightly high near ankle bone on outside and rubs a little. Laces stay tied but the tongue bunches up a little (medium width foot). I typically order half-size larger for running shoes and did the same with these even though primarily using for walking and these are generously sized, I would order regular size if ordering again. Overall comfortable and durable shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Women's Fresh Foam Roav V1 Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic shoe! I haven't worn NB in years because they quite frankly were not very nice looking. These caught my eye on Amazon so I thought I would give them a shot. I have a neutral gait and these are a neutral shoe. I have to say they really surprised me, they are a great shoe! They fit true to size, they are super comfortable and very nicely cushioned. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Useful only for shopping...
customer_reviews.text: It feels like your foot is about to come out of this shoe while you're walking, and I believe it's due to the lack of lacing a typical athletic shoe should have. Theyre designed to fit loose I think. Clearly these are meant only for looks, and not for the gym. I wasted my money 😡.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for the money.
customer_reviews.text: If you've been looking for a good walking shoe this is it. First day of walking and this shoe is comfortable. It took me a minute to get use to the immovable tongue in the shoe. Other than this, a good shoe. I hope it lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and support
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide, flat foot with a high instep. Buying shoes presents it's challenges but heels and workout shoes are the hardest to find. New Balance has been my go-to workout brand, so it's no surprise that these look and feel great. If you buy wide, it is def wide. My foot is fully supported and the brand is 100% right- no need to wear them in; you just put them on and go! I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Krys

customer_reviews.title: Not for overpronaters
customer_reviews.text: I overpronate and thought this shoe would help based on reviews but it does not. Color and style is great but after about two months of walks I almost feel like I wore the shoe out. It feels very flimsy and my feet hurt right when I start walking.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Apfel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow I’m frickin OBSESSED with these shoes. I bought them because it was on sale and it looked cute. I never wore New Balance until now and I cannot rave about them enough! Not only are they SUPER stylish, they are literally walking on clouds! It’s lightweight and the design is very well thought out. I should have bought more when they were on sale. I’ll be keeping an eye out for the next time they go on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Hsiaowow

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not for long toes unless you size up
customer_reviews.text: If you have long toes I suggest sizing up half a size. I thought it would be ok because the sneakers are so super comfy but after a week or two you definitely noticed the sizing. My middle toe is longer than the rest of my toes and unfortunately this sneaker can not be worn for long periods of time, I should’ve sent mine back for a larger size. Cute and comfortable sneaker though well worth the money so I would buy them again but sizing up when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Aaliyah Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Cute style, didn’t love the fit.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these shoes. They’re really cute but they just didn’t feel right. The heel was really loose and you can’t really tighten that based on the style. I think my pair may have been defective as well since I felt like my left foot only was rolling in a bit when I’d walk. They’re comfy at first, nice amount of cushion, but just didn’t feel right to me.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good for thick feet, bad for me
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were super cute, but because they have a more sock like construction, versus the typical shoe tongue they were way to roomy in the thickness/ top of foot. Once I got the laces tight, the material kind of bunched up under the laces, and it wasn't comfortable. They're cute and cushy, especially in the ball of the foot, which is where I prefer the squish, but better for wide or thick feet
customer_reviews.author: Marie Wellock

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, bright and fun.
customer_reviews.text: They fit pretty true to size. A smidge tight. I wear a 10 but, wish I would have gotten just a half size bigger in these, the toes are a bit narrow. A half size up would have made them that much more comfortable. That being said. They are still super comfortable and easy to get on/off. Also, obviously the design and colors are just gorgeous. I love a colorful shoe to make my health routine that much more fun and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Sam J.

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: These kook look great, but are really wide. This wasn't such a bad thing as there really isn't much cushioning in them so I had to add gel insoles. The laces constantly come untied unless you double knot.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really cute, but did not work for me. The tongue is attached to the sides, so you can't tighten up the laces to secure the shoe to your foot. The heel would just fall off as I stepped. I usually wear 8.5 in running shoes, but this was too big. Size down by .5 and don't bother at all if your foot is narrow or shallow in depth.
customer_reviews.author: Amatek

customer_reviews.title: wierd design for new balance
customer_reviews.text: these shoes look great, fit well enough but they have nooooo foot padding or arch support. my feet really hurt after wearing them during the day.....am going to try inserting dr. scholls pads to see if it helps...not happy with this new balance purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: jimbob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: When I received this shoe, I took them out of the box and saved the box thinking that I would wear them around the house for a little bit to see if I liked them. I was about 6 minutes in and I put the box in the recycling! These shoes have the the elastic piece that goes across the top where the tongue is. The tongue, and elastic are all connected so there was no issues with the tongue leaving marks on my foot or or being uncomfortable. The foam back is super comfortable on your heal. I can't even explain how these shoes feel! They fit like a glove!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I loved this shoe. The colors are very vibrant and the shoe itself is SUPER comfy. I was saddened that my usual 6.5 was much too small. This shoe fit me like a 6. I had to size up half a size. Update: I received the size 7. Those fit well. Still SUPER comfy. Love them. The color is great and I always get compliments when I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Paige008

customer_reviews.title: I want these in more colors!
customer_reviews.text: I am super picky about athletic shoes because I have a narrow heel and nothing seems to fit just right. These do! They are the most comfortable, supportive sneakers I have gotten in a long time, and the fact that they also look cool is a bonus. My Mom said they make my size 9 feet look smaller. The price was also great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but not true to size
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel and look of these, but I ordered the same size I’ve always bought in NB shoes but these are huge! As you can see in the photo my big toe is no where near the top of the shoe. Also provided a photo of my current NB next to these. I have started the exchange process to get a smaller size. If they were true to size they would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, perfect width
customer_reviews.text: I found this shoe to be just what I wanted. I was a bit surprised that the tongue of the shoe was not open as in other shoes, but had a band which at first I was concerned that I would not be able to fit my wide foot into. However, it worked out well, and give added support over the arch and top of my foot. Excellent shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Cjfrog

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These have to be one of the most comfortable tennis shoes I have ever wore! My feet don’t bother me after walking all day in them. I loved them so much I bought them in purple too. I would not recommend doing certain workouts in them because the back heal part is more flexible and can slide off. It’s hard to pull the laces tight.
customer_reviews.author: MandiR

customer_reviews.title: No pain, so comfortable, breathable, and flexible
customer_reviews.text: The memory foam and full length support help reduce the pain in my feet. So so comfortable, Breathable, flexible, and easy to slip on and off. Order a different Memory foam shoe and there were high and low spots all along the shoe like sleeping on a lumpy mattress. Made me all the more grateful that I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Spice

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for walking and working!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter at a very good price from Amazon. She says they are very comfortable for walking. She also has been wearing them to work as a nurse pulling 12-hour shifts on her feet. She says they seem to help her feet and hips feel much better than her last few pairs of walking shoes from other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Lori D.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far I love these shoes. I typically run 3 miles 5 days a week. So far, no pain except a little bit of rubbing on the backs of my ankles. I had pretty bad shin splints that I had to take time off from running to heal and got these shoes just before starting back up. So far, no new shin pain. It’s been almost 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic plantar fasciitis and I like these but they could be a little more comfortable. They should be great for a normal person but my feet hurt every day so it’s an issue for me and honestly I only have one pair of shoes that my feet are only at a 1-2 on the pain scale after a day on them.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ian Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: You can purchase NB shoes online and they fit!
customer_reviews.text: True to size. Fits terrific and supports very well. I normally buy NB shoes at the NB store because I need to get the insoles and the wide width section is better there. Took a chance during this COVID situation to try these- took the insoles out of my old pair and placed them in this pair. Plan to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Wood

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a little narrow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I already have a pair of these in a different color and I love them. When I got these though, they are a little more narrow than my other pair even though I ordered the same size. They still fit, but they are tighter so they aren't as comfortable to me as the other ones I have.
customer_reviews.author: Dezaray

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality shoes.
customer_reviews.text: When I first got these shoes, I really liked them. However after only 3 months of a daily 3 mile walk/run they developed holes in each shoe as pictured above. As this appears to be a design flaw, I reached out to New Balance to inquire about honoring a warranty, however they did not respond to my inquiry. Poor value and quality for your money. I’m sad to say I will not be purchasing New Balance moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy q

customer_reviews.title: Feels like cardboard
customer_reviews.text: After seeing so many reviews I thought the shoe was going to feel like walking on a cloud, boy was that wrong! It feels like you put a piece of cardboard over a rubber sole. Not worth more than $5.
customer_reviews.author: Arabella Jean

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for fashion
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these shoes, and bought them primarily for fashion (running errands, etc.). Once they get dirty, I plan to wear them for runs, which they will be awesome for. They are very comfortable, and fit just like all my other New Balance shoes. The price on Amazon was the best.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable casual sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and often order 7.5 2E from New Balance. This 7.5 W fit me nicely and was comfortable out of the box. Did a 30 minutes workout the first day and they felt good. Next day after wearing for several hours my feet began to fatigue. I like that you can tie them and just slip in for everyday use. So happy that I could finally have some options in colors for my wide feet. Previous Fresh Foam versions were limited to two colors in the wide widths.
customer_reviews.author: Cary

customer_reviews.title: Great for a more narrow foot
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are exactly what I needed in my life. They are stylish yet comfortable. I finally found a shoe that fits my somewhat narrow foot without buying a narrow that ends up being too tight. The colors are vibrant and I’ve gotten a lot of compliments! I would say this is not so much made for working out but for daily wear.
customer_reviews.author: NolansMomma

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Not near as comfortable as others and the sizing is off. They were also advertised as narrow and that was not true!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for walking all day.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for walking all day. I have trypically purchased running shoes but I noticed they are never ideal for walking. These provide great cushion in the heels especially which is perfect for walking. They also look really cute and stylish. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Head

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever put on my feet!! I love the design and look just as well. I have had so many compliments. I have made sure I memorized roav v1. Cause this is the only running shoe I will ever buy again. I have chronic Achilles tendinitis and the material and way the backs are made don’t bother it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Comfy, a little Loose
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are extremely comfortable. Almost feels like you’re not wearing shoes. Very breathable. If you have a narrow foot, they might be a bit big on you. Love the style. The back looks like a sock kind of. I purchased 2 colors and get compliments while wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoes but not ideal for workouts.
customer_reviews.text: For anyone who workouts, you should avoid these as they do slip if you wear socks. I have had my shoes come out during workouts even though the shoelaces were intact. I also wouldn't recommend these to seniors as the slip aspect could potentially lead to injury.
customer_reviews.author: Nabilla Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: BEST SHOES EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes for plantar fasciitis. I ordered the black and white ones. I'm size 8 1/2 And sometimes 9 depending on the shoes. I ordered 9.5 Wide just in case and they fit perfectly! Definitely provides support. The heal of the shoes are firm and thick. Compared to other shoes I purchased these shoes seem to provide more support. The insole support are thin. I will take those out and add the thick insoles I have from my previous shoes. Definitely feel more comfortable walking. I wouldn't say these shoes are for working out though. Honestly, just walking and for casual use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable even for walking let alone running
customer_reviews.text: Very very uncomfortable, I received my order today and I wore my tina shoes for less than 4 hours and my feet are killing me. Unfortunately, I wore them outside so I can’t return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: I only wear New Balance sneakers because they carry wide width! Been wearing New Balance for over 30 years! I love these sneakers! Very lightweight, somewhat supportive and you dont have to untie to take them off and put them on! And you can't beat the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: FAVORITE SHOES!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, these shoes are GREAT. It feels like you're walking on clouds when you're wearing these, yet they still manage to offer lots of support too! I've worn them for hikes and long walks and they've been wonderful. I will be buying more of these FOR SURE.
customer_reviews.author: P. R.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good looking
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and are very comfortable. I like that the tongue is not a totally independent piece, so it stays perfectly centered. I receive compliments on these shoes all the time. I bought them during the Style Sale so they were $25 off. I would buy them again without hesitation
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: If you have wide feet dong trust these sneakers. I’m surprised that new balance wide fit was this uncomfortable. The laces are for show the shoe is basically a slip on with a band right in the middle to keep them on your feet. It squeezes ALL the wrong places. After less than 10 minutes of walking, I was in extreme pain. The next morning my feet were CRIPPLED after walking for 40 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Bornico

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a size 8 for you my wife as it was indicated that the usual size should be purchased. They were too small so returned for an 8.5. It was even smaller. Gave up and returned them too. She bought another brand that she loves.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Evans

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!! Run big, size down a half size.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this shoe!! I originally ordered my normal size of 7.5 but my heel would slip out. I now have 2 pairs of NB and I have come to realize that I need to size down half a size to a 7 and the fit great!! Super comfy and great style!
customer_reviews.author: Dems59

customer_reviews.title: Just WOW
customer_reviews.text: These have got to be one of the most comfortable sneakers I have ever owned. For this price it was a steal ! They are super light , just enough cushion and arch support for flat feet so that it's not uncomfortable. Airs flows through perfectly as well
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!!! It took me forever to find my size and color in stock but it was worth the wait. Love these!! Super comfortable and stylish! I’ve gotten lots of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my daughter and she loves them. Color (pink) was true to picture and was just what she wanted. She loves how "squishy" they feel and loves them to run in.
customer_reviews.author: ytietz

customer_reviews.title: You're sure to get compliments on these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute sneakers. They are very light. Probably not for heavy duty walking but I haven't had them long do I may be wrong on that. I have fibromyalgia and need very substantial sneakers for good support but these are so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Jude bug

customer_reviews.title: New Favorites
customer_reviews.text: Great arch support. Have not worn them out yet due to Covid-19. But I wore them on the treadmill to see how they would feel. Very comfortable. I will order another pair just for the treadmill. AND also my husband received a pair as a gift, he loved them so much that he ordered 2 more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Anita D

customer_reviews.title: 👌🏻!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. I like the sleek shape and the numerous colors available. They provide more support than my Skechers. I LOVE the slip ons. The only thing I’m not a fan of is the inner cushion coming out every time I take my foot out. Getting another color soon. Well done, New Balance!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: only ok
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of new Balnce. I wear a size 81/2-9 with Nike and Adidas. For some reason I just can't get the right size with NB. I ordered a size 10 as my last pair I got size 9 1/2 I can wear it. but feels tight on my toes. The size 10 fits like the 9 1/2 Comfy shoe just need more room at the toe. UGH! CAN'T WAIT UNTIL MALLS OPEN SO I CAN GET A BETTER PAIR OF SHOES TO WORKOUT IN.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Terrible shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoes has absolutely nothing. Brooks are way better for support. These basically have a cushioned heel but the fit is so wide that when you pull the shoestrings, it bunches everywhere. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof3

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, but sometimes need to size up for comfort
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were for workout. They are lovely looking and the only reason I didn’t give fives was because they were too short for my toes. I couldn’t get the half size up, so ordered them in another color. They have a nice arch and look really nice on your feet. They will keep coming in in various sizes and colors, because they are good looking and super popular
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Rosner

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker for my flat feet
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet and these sneakers are very comfortable for me. I was able to walk around most of the day and my feet didn’t hurt!! They are also fairly light weight, which I like a lot.
customer_reviews.author: amlarivs

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but no arch support
customer_reviews.text: Love that these slip on and off easily, making them a great shoe for working in the hospital, however, they do run quite big. I normally wear a 9 1/2- 10. I got the 10 and would have been better in a 9. I would recommend going at least a half size down. Also, they offer very little arch support.
customer_reviews.author: KimN.

product_meta.title: New Balance Women's Fresh Foam Roav Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Transforming style and comfort, the New Balance Fresh Foam Roav women’s shoe delivers an incomparable ride that cradles your foot in comfort. The shoe is engineered with a ultra heel construction for seamless comfort and a full-ground contact outsole for a comfortable underfoot feel.
feature_bullets: Truly Unique: The New Balance Fresh Foam Roav v1 running shoes are the ultimate in casual athletic style. Pairing a bold, attractive look with plush comfort, these cushioned running shoes are in a league of their own.

Fresh Foam Midsole: Feel like you're running or walking in the clouds. The first of three proprietary technologies in this athletic shoe, Fresh Foam midsole cushioning is precision engineered to deliver an ultra-cushioned, lightweight ride.

NDurance Outsole: Step up your game without wearing out your favorite running shoes. Ndurance rubber outsole technology provides superior durability in high-wear areas to help get more out of the shoes.

Ultra Heel: These neutral running shoes boast a head-turning heel that performs as well as it looks. The Ultra Heel design hugs the back of the foot for a snug, supportive fit. This unique heel works alongside the bootie upper for all-day comfort.
8mm Drop: These lightweight shoes feature a heel-to-toe drop of approximately 8mm. Due to variances created during development and manufacturing processes, references to 8mm are approximate.
